items.question: Does the platform support RTL fully?
items.answer: Yes. Navigation, layouts, and typography flip automatically when Arabic is active.

items.question: How is access secured?
items.answer: Single sign-on, audit logs, and token-driven theming keep the experience consistent with security controls.

items.question: Can we export evidence and timelines?
items.answer: Yes. Structured exports and printable summaries are available from dashboards.

items.question: Do you offer onboarding in Arabic?
items.answer: Interactive tours, tooltips, and email support are localized for Arabic teams.
